typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		data as (attributes as (emails as string[], updatedAt as string), id as string, links as (self as string), meta as (dataConnections as (connection as string, id as string, type as string, url as string)[]), type as string),
		links as (first as string, next as string, prev as string),
		meta as (count as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(data.attributes.emails),
	mapColumn(
		data,
		links,
		meta
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
